params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function used inside the SamMaskDecoder module.

params.name: mlp_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (i.e., feed-forward) layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: attention_downsample_rate
params.description: The downsampling rate of the attention layer.

params.name: num_multimask_outputs
params.description: The number of outputs from the SamMaskDecoder module. In the Segment Anything paper, this is set to 3.

params.name: iou_head_depth
params.description: The number of layers in the IoU head module.

params.name: iou_head_hidden_dim
params.description: The dimensionality of the hidden states in the IoU head module.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.
